name: chorPolice
description:
The game is created on "Unity Engine",  the main idea of the game is that there is a thief who  has stolen a car, and a police car is chasing him to catch.

User have controls to thief's car only which is controlled by up-down and left-right keys of the keyboard and he need to escape from police .

Police car automatically chases the thief car, no need to control it by the user.
